subject: We are ready to give you a loan
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$257,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://domerbase.com/
